def has_plate_or_cup_in_sink(sink:item):
    # Determine if there is a plate or cup in the specified sink
    symbol has_plate_or_cup=exists o: item : (is_plate(o) or is_cup(o)) and inside(o, sink)
    return has_plate_or_cup

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom_sink: item where:
            is_sink(bathroom_sink) and id[bathroom_sink]==42
        # Select the sink with ID 42 in the bathroom

        if has_plate_or_cup_in_sink(bathroom_sink):
            # If plates or cups are in the sink, approach it
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and has_plate_or_cup_in_sink(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)
        else:
            # If the item is not visited, inspect it to verify any misclassified items
            if not visited(bathroom_sink):
                observe(bathroom_sink, "Check is there any plate or cup in the bathroom sink")

        if visited(bathroom_sink) and not has_water(bathroom_sink):
            # Proceed to fill the sink with water
            achieve is_on(faucet)

def has_plate_or_cup_in_sink(sink:item):
    # Determine if there is a plate or cup in the specified sink
    symbol has_plate_or_cup=exists o: item : (is_plate(o) or is_cup(o)) and inside(o, sink)
    return has_plate_or_cup

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom_sink: item where:
            is_sink(bathroom_sink) and id[bathroom_sink]==42
        # Select the sink with ID 42 in the bathroom

        if has_plate_or_cup_in_sink(bathroom_sink):
            # If plates or cups are in the sink, approach it
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and has_plate_or_cup_in_sink(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)
        else:
            # If the item is not visited, inspect it to verify any misclassified items
            if not visited(bathroom_sink):
                observe(bathroom_sink, "Check is there any plate or cup in the bathroom sink")

        if visited(bathroom_sink) and not has_water(bathroom_sink):
            # Proceed to fill the sink with water
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet)
            achieve is_on(faucet)
